summary: Retex of Skyrim Barrels, 3 versions at this stage, resolution has been considerably increased.
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/geeq4hv.jpg[/IMG]

Retex of both types of Barrel in Skyrim.
At this stage there are 3 different versions. The resolution has been considerably increased.

Normal maps included in all versions.

I may work on more in the future. Perhaps the n maps could have been decreased a bit. But
i like the versions.

I may redo the maps to tone down the textures a bit.



[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ilD8Whk.jpg[/IMG]

Use NMM to install.

To uninstall, use NMM. Simple.
File path is data\\textures\\clutter.



[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/y6FNsCm.jpg[/IMG]

Use only 1 version of this at a time.
Not compatible with anything that edits barrel_01 and barrel_02.



[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/21bAygX.jpg[/IMG]

Bethesda, for creating a great game, and one that\'s modable.
Nexus.
Nexus Community and modders alike.

Questions? Comments? Constructive criticism? Fire away!

This mod is freeware
NOT to be used for commercial purposes.
If you want to use any part of this mod for integration into another mod, no problem,
just credit me, only fair.
Nexus-exclusive mod. NO upload to other sites under any circumstances.

Cheers for checking this mod out.
author: heeresman1
